name: Mortal Fire
description:
FIGHT LIKE HELL

Mortal fire is a fast-paced rogue-like shooter.

Take on waves of enemies with increasing speed and strength, all while juggling a combination of upgrades that you'll need in order to hold out against the horde!

The question isn't if you'll survive, but how long for.

Controls

Move: WASD

Shoot/Select: Mouse
